column5: Nice work and nice ski's! Wish my wife could hold a musky like that.
Pete delivers again looks like a great day......no trampoline photo what happened
Trampoline had no action. We only hit it once in the morning.
Good on Pete, dood knows his skis!  Well done for you and the Missus, great looking fish.

Pete from OFC took me and my wife out for a full day of Musky fishing on Pigeon. The weather was cold and wet, but we had a great day and landed some decent fish!  My wife started the day off landing a 39.5" on a senko (yes senko), on a light spinning rod for bass (she was taking a break from casting the big heavy stuff). I guess they wanted a really slow small presentation in the morning.    We found an amazing spot mid afternoon that was on fire. Landed two good muskies and had 2 more follows to the boat.  First one was 42"    Second one was 40"    I'll keep the lures a secret between me and Pete
You're a lucky guy.   Keep her happy.  You have yourself a keeper.
Nicely done!!!!!!
One of the best spots on the lake, this time of year.....  Right off the end of the bay where I live.
Well there you go, you just never know WHO is 'Watching'!

One of the best spots on the lake, this time of year.....  Right off the end of the bay where I live.  I don't even remember where we were on the lake if you can tell from that picture.  Well there you go, you just never know WHO is 'Watching'!  I guess this is in reference to the post above?
Nice work! Never got a big one in the boat.
Awesome folks
Awesome folks
right on nice fish
Good day on the water all the fish look nice and healthy
You guys got some nice Kawartha Muskies there. Thanks for sharing!
I don't even remember where we were on the lake if you can tell from that picture.    Know exactly where it is...  By the way, nice fish.
Great work@@
Those are my stomping grounds there! Nice job.
Great job!!! Nice Kawartha 'skis.
Cant beat a musky fishin couple!  Nice fishies guy/gal!!!  Something about that pete guy??? Never seems to dissapoint...  Miigwich for the report
I don't even remember where we were on the lake if you can tell from that picture.   I guess this is in reference to the post above?  Just an inside joke for Tom.  Nice Muskies BTW!
Just an inside joke for Tom.  Nice Muskies BTW!  Yup...Could have been me taking the pictures.......
Nice going....thats it pete...were going musky fishing i have finally broke.
Yup...Could have been me taking the pictures....... LOL.  Time to crop eh...  hehe Good on ya T for you, the Mrs and Pete geting some good big old fish.
Just an inside joke for Tom.  Nice Muskies BTW!  lol got it! wasn't sure the dialogue before hand.  Thanks for all the replies guys. Wouldnt have happened without Pete and his really nice equipment.
My lips are sealed on that spot. :-)

It was a pleasure taking you two out! Was a cold and windy day for sure but you and D toughed it out and we finally found that spot with a bunch of active fish in the afternoon. I think I have to start carrying a tray of senkos with me in the boat now... that was awesome.  Cheers! Pete

not surprised at all, Pete delivers as always...and as always simply a heck of a guy to fish with.  Congrats on the skis! im sure you have the musky bug just like me now because of Pete. His enthusiasm for the species is contagious
